{{Infobox football biography | playername = Edmilson | fullname = Edmilson dos Santos Silva | image = [[Image:Replace this image male.svg|150px]] | dateofbirth = {{Birth date and age|1982|9|15}} | cityofbirth = [[Salvador, Bahia]] | countryofbirth = [[Brazil]] | height = {{convert|1.83|m|ftin|0|abbr=on}} | currentclub = [[Al-Gharafa Sports Club|Al-Gharafa]] | clubnumber = 9 | position = [[Forward (association football)|Striker]] | years1 = 2001â2005 | clubs1 = [[Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras|Palmeiras]] | caps1 = ? | goals1 = ? | years2 = 2004 | clubs2 = â [[Albirex Niigata]] (loan) | caps2 = 29 | goals2 = 15 | years3 = 2005â2007 | clubs3 = [[Albirex Niigata]] | caps3 = 87 | goals3 = 47 | years4 = 2008â2011 | clubs4 = [[Urawa Red Diamonds]] | caps4 = 110 | goals4 = 47 | years5 = 2011â | clubs5 = [[Al-Gharafa Sports Club|Al-Gharafa]] | caps5 = | goals5 = | pcupdate = 22 June 2011 }}
'''Edmilson dos Santos Silva''', or simply '''Edmilson''' (born September 15, 1982), is a [[Brazil]]ian [[striker]]. He currently plays for [[Qatari Premier League]] side [[Al-Gharafa Sports Club]].
==Club career== Edmilson started his career playing for the [[Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras|Palmeiras]]. In January 2004, he joined [[J-League]] side [[Albirex Niigata]] on loan from Palmeiras. He had a short loan spell at Niigata, and signed a permanent deal next year. He played for the club, scoring 62 league goals in four seasons as a regular player.
Edmilson moved to J. League rival [[Urawa Red Diamonds]] in January 2008. He continued his successful career with Urawa, scoring 11 goals in 31 appearances. He ended up the second highest scorer in the league for the [[2009 J. League Division 1|2009 season]] with 17 goals.
On 29 June 2011, Urawa announced that Edmilson would leave Japan to join Qatari club [[Al-Gharafa Sports Club|Al-Gharafa]].<ref name="urawa">{{cite news|url=http://www.urawa-reds.co.jp/tools/page_store/news_7059.html|title=ã¨ã¸ãã¦ã½ã³ãã¢ã«ã¬ã©ãã¡ã«å®å ¨ç§»ç±|date=29 June 2011|accessdate=29 June 2011|work=[[Urawa Red Diamonds]] official site|language=Japanese}}</ref>
